tool_description:
Reduce the risk of fraud on your platform by onboarding only those individuals whose PAN is linked with their Aadhaar, in accordance with the laws of India.

Reduce manual efforts by calling a single API which tells you if an individual’s PAN Aadhaar link exists or not.
name: Verify PAN Aadhaar link
title: Verify PAN Aadhaar link

api_list.name: Verify PAN Aadhaar link
api_list.description:
Reduce the risk of fraud on your platform by onboarding only those individuals whose PAN is linked with their Aadhaar, in accordance with the laws of India.

Reduce manual efforts by calling a single API which tells you if an individual’s PAN Aadhaar link exists or not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://verify-pan-aadhaar-link.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/pan_aadhaar_link"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "verify-pan-aadhaar-link.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://verify-pan-aadhaar-link.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/pan_aadhaar_link"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "verify-pan-aadhaar-link.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
